OOC: I know i moded when I sent Ra into the Ark, but I was bored and i was 
hoping to start a fight. I guess we can forget about that....

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast loomed over Black Aracna as she typed in the computer, and 
then suddenly an alarm sounded and a new ship was in orbit, 
coming in closer :::

::: Hell Beast ::: ANOTHER SHIP? WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?!!!!!!!!!!!

::: Transanulas ::: Wait, it has Predacon markings, and design.

::: Hell Beast ::: Most likely a Maximal trick, open a channel now!

::: Pheniox opened a channel, Gremlin, Jackle, Inferno, Rampage, Tankkor, 
Scourge, and the other Predacons watched. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: This is Senator Hell Beast of the Predacon Allience. I am 
the Commander of this important outpost on a covert mission. You presence 
here is unexpected, but also welcome. Currently we are at a gruesome battle 
with Maximals and other rouge groups that have arrived here. Your relief here 
would be very appreciated. I hope you find a suitable landing spot and as 
soon as you are settled I wish to hold a conference with you on this new 
situation.

::: With that, he shut off the Comm. :::

::: Transanulas broke the silence that had filled the room durring the 
speech. ::: Do you actually think another Predacon commander came here in 
that giant ship to help us out? They came here to remove us!

::: Hell Beast ::: Im a Senator. I know how Predacon politics work. And i do 
agree with you, spider. They probly did come here to get rid of us. It has 
been far past the deadline to get the energon back to Cybertron, but the ship 
is a bit unmoveable at the moment.

::: Black Aracnia ::: So we're just going to sit here and let them kill us?

::: Hell Beast ::: No, no. I will talk with them first, find out what there 
motive is first. we will play it by ear for the moment. But I assure you, we 
wil not let these Predacons remove us from here.

::: The Predacons gave chuckles and resumed work. :::
